msg_enable_feature_tip: After enabling this feature, please go to Robot > Function Center to configure and use it
msg_close_confirm_default: After closing, this feature will be disabled by default and will no longer be available. All WeChat menu items will be deactivated. Confirm to close?
msg_close_confirm_library: After closing, the knowledge base module will no longer display the WeChat knowledge base module. Previously imported articles will not be available for reference. Confirm to close?
msg_close_confirm_payment: After closing, the configured payment strategy will be disabled. Confirm to close?
